Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 7600x | GPU: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 | RAM: 32GB DDR5

 

RoveMax TR4 wheel collision mesh is still very basic (only at center of the wheel) and causes vehicle instability.

Also the RoveMax TR2-L wheel collision meshes are bad - when on one side, the wheels enter the ground.
